General.Name: Graphano Energy Ltd
General.Description: Graphano Energy Ltd., a mining company, focuses on the evaluating, acquiring, and developing graphite resources in Canada. It holds a 100% interest in the Lac Aux Bouleaux Graphite property consisting 14 mineral claims and covering an area of approximately 738.12 hectares located in Quebec, Canada. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1000 - 595 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7X 1S8
